Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: A Dubai tourism fee of AED 15 per bedroom per night will be charged at check-out. The fee applies to ALL bookings.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Situated in the Deira business district and offering over 20 modern event spaces, our hotel is an ideal location for a corporate conference in Dubai.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Our ten restaurants and bars bring an international flair to Dubai, offering everything from classic Bavarian to 4-star Asian-fusion cuisine.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Spend a day wandering the ancient spice and jewelry stalls at the nearby Dubai Spice and Gold Souks - both are only minutes from our hotel.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Experience unparalleled elegance and luxury at the four-star JW Marriott Hotel Dubai, located in the thriving business district of Deira.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The award-winning JW Marriott Hotel Dubai is renowned for its luxury hotel rooms, exquisite restaurants, and elegant meeting room spaces. Set in the city's flourishing business district, just ten minutes away from Dubai International Airport, our four-star hotel reflects the city's modern, vibrant personality. Our 351 thoughtfully designed guest rooms and suites feature outstanding luxury amenities such as marble spa bathrooms and plush, designer bedding. Begin your day in Dubai with a visit to our state-of-the-art Griffins Health Club, which offers guests a full fitness center, a stunning rooftop pool, a sauna, and squash courts. We invite you to enjoy our diverse assortment of hotel restaurants; take a client to dinner at JW Steakhouse, or enjoy a romantic evening at Cucina, our signature Italian restaurant. Whether you're in Dubai to leisurely explore the city or to handle business affairs, we look forward to welcoming you here at the 4-star JW Marriott Hotel Dubai.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Luxury hotel located in the business district of Deira & just 10 minutes away from Dubai International Airport. Offering the largest variety of suite & room choices, along with the best restaurants in Dubai UAE - chose from 11 restaurants, lounges and bar

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our hotel's 351 guest rooms and suites embody the ultimate in luxury and refinement in Dubai.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Relax in our marble bathrooms outfitted with upscale spa amenities and plush robes and slippers.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Settle into our comfortable, soft beds and enjoy perks like complimentary daily newspaper delivery.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Stay connected in Dubai with high-speed Internet access and international satellite cable service.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Upgrade to an Executive Level guest room for complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea, and cocktails.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: It's easy to access our top-rated hotel from any one of Dubai International Airport's terminals.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Our hotel's 351 guest rooms and suites embody the ultimate in luxury and refinement in Dubai.
Relax in our marble bathrooms outfitted with upscale spa amenities and plush robes and slippers.
Settle into our comfortable, soft beds and enjoy perks like complimentary daily newspaper delivery.
Stay connected in Dubai with high-speed Internet access and international satellite cable service.
Upgrade to an Executive Level guest room for complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea, and cocktails.
It's easy to access our top-rated hotel from any one of Dubai International Airport's terminals.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our award-winning conference facility boasts over 2,900 square feet of modern meeting space.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Enjoy high-speed Internet access and state-of-the-art audiovisual services in each conference room.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Reserve our sophisticated Deira Ballroom for a large corporate conference with up to 700 guests.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Tap into the expertise of our experienced events staff to help you coordinate your Dubai meeting.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Take advantage of our hotel's on-site business services, including printing, faxing, and copying.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Business guests staying in Dubai will enjoy our downtown location, near many large corporations.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Discover the fragrant spice stalls at the nearby Dubai Spice Souk, only minutes from our hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Shop for beautiful gold jewelry at the neighboring Dubai Gold Souk, the city's most famous souk.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Go back in time at Dubai's Heritage & Diving Villages, which highlights the city's storied past.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: See Dubai from its life giving source, The Dubai Creek Dhow Wharfage and Abra Station

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Take a break in the middle of the City Center in the Dubai Creek Golf and Yacht Club

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: The future of interactive education at Zabeel Park Star Gate. Science fiction is now science fact

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: We can accommodate weddings of all sizes in our 31,215 square feet of flexible venue space.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Over 1,000 guests can attend a grand wedding reception in our stunning Amal Grand Ballroom.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Take advantage of our state-of-the-art hydraulic stage, which can support up to six tons of weight.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Allow our experienced catering team to create a distinctive and memorable menu for your Dubai event.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our dedicated on-site event planners will ensure your wedding reception here in Dubai is flawless.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Inquire about our booking opportunities and wedding block options for parties of ten rooms or more.

Description.Name: Renovation Area Description 1
Description.Text: The hotel gym is currently undergoing renovation through April 10, 2015. We do apologize for the inconvenience as we work to improve the guest experience.

Description.Text: Complimentary valet parking for inhouse guests.

Description.Name: Bottled Water In Room - For a Fee

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy casual, internationally-influenced fare like pasta, chicken, and curries at the Market Place Restaurant, our casual dining establishment.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy a taste of Italy here in Deira, Dubai at Cucina, our trattoria-style restaurant serving authentic Italian specialties in a rustic and relaxed atmosphere.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: One of the more popular restaurants in Deira, Dubai, the award-winning JW’s Steakhouse serves delicious Angus steaks and fresh seafood in an elegant setting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Featuring casual cuisine, flat-screen TVs, and pool tables, Champion Sports Bar is an American-style bar and grill in the heart of Dubai.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Ideal for a night out with friends or co-workers, our Hofbräuhaus restaurant serves hearty Bavarian fare and delicious German brews.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving a mix of Polynesian, Indonesian and Thai cuisine in a tropical setting featuring waterfalls, Bamboo Lagoon is a truly memorable restaurant experience.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy craft cocktails and light hors d'oeuvres, in our refined Piano Lounge bar, a perfect place to start - or end - an evening out in Dubai.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Atrium Cafe, our casual, grab-and-go restaurant, features signature Starbucks® coffee drinks and light take-away refreshments for your convenience.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving classic coffee specialties and homemade Austrian cakes and pastries, our 24-hour Vienna Café brings a bit of Austria to Dubai.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A relaxing rooftop oasis, Waves Pool Bar serves tropical drinks, light snacks and lunch fare in a serene poolside setting.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Relaxed street-level coffee shop featuring friendly service in a casual environment. An inviting setting with a tantalizing international menu that offers a satisfying and delicious dining experience.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Serving the most succulent steaks in all of Dubai, this boutique steakhouse only delivers the best ingredients, service and ambiance. Within an upscale restaurant setting, guests will delight in the finest cuts and discover how fine dining should be.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Explore exotic Indian cuisine with a modern twist at Rang Mahal by Atul Kochhar, the most sophisticated Dubai Indian restaurant. Situated in an upscale atmosphere, you will revel in hand-crafted creations full of flavorful ingredients.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy unparalleled service with a menu that showcases unique regional dishes at our savory Thai restaurant in Dubai. Celebrating street food as well as authentic classics celebrated around the world.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Positano serves chef crafted seafood, handmade pasta, mouthwatering pizza and homemade gelato. Toast to health and happiness and enjoy the Positano experience, passionately Italian.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A cool, exciting place to share great food and drink with your friends, our casual Japanese restaurant in Dubai will delight even the choosiest taste buds. Enjoy social sushi at its best or celebrate in the fun of traditional hibachi-style meals.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover a relaxing 24-hour bistro and bakery where you can relax and enjoy fresh coffee and snacks at your convenience. Treat your taste buds to scrumptious French croissants, baguettes, tarts, éclairs, quiche, fruit and freshly squeezed juices.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Kitchen 6 is an international buffet featuring Asian woks, Middle Eastern grills, European breads and Indian tandoors glowing through glass walls. The open kitchen invites you to watch chefs at work creating only the finest gastronomic delights.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Contemporary and sophisticated, Nawwara celebrates the region's finest cuisines, perfectly prepared and executed with flair. Whether indoors or outdoors on the terrace enjoying mezze and a water pipe.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Traveling doesn't mean you should have to let go of your favorite foods. Serving gourmet comfort food in a casual, yet upscale atmosphere, Velocity offers traditional international delights that will please your taste buds and make you feel at home.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: An exclusive bar located on the 71st and 72nd floors, Vault is an exquisite formal lounge experience. Featuring a cigar lounge and breathtaking city views, those looking for a sophisticated retreat will revel in this bar's unforgettable atmosphere.

Address.AddressLine: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai,Business Bay, Sheikh Zayed Rd

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located on the 52nd floor of our hotel, The Observatory offers magnificent 360-degree views across Dubai Marina. Stop by the restaurant and bar after work for a happy hour or indulge in a spectacular champagne brunch buffet in Dubai.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover Spanish, Moroccan, French and Italian flavors in one of the premier Dubai Marina restaurants. After dinner, step out on the terrace under the stars with breathtaking views of the marina to end a relaxing day with an impressive backdrop.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Catch up with friends, family or colleagues or enjoy a good book at Counter Culture. As one of the most inviting restaurants in Dubai Marina, you can enjoy delicious culinary delights for breakfast and lunch in a relaxed coffee house atmosphere.

Address.AddressLine: Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel & Suites,,Al Sufouh Road, Dubai Marina

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This casual, poolside restaurant’s menu is full of satisfying sandwiches, snacks & refreshing beverages served daily from 10 a.m. until 6 p.m.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Specializing in rustic Italian dishes, including pizzas from a wood-burning oven and an antipasti counter, our Dubai Italian restaurant's menu brings the flavors of Italy to Dubai. Outdoor, lake-view seating is available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Top among international restaurants in Dubai, Pine Grill serves breakfast, lunch and an a la carte dinner menu with a focus on freshly grilled steaks, seafood dishes and international fare. Outdoor seating, which overlooks the lake, is available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Authentic Italian cooking for contemporary palates. Enjoy fresh breads, pastas and deli items in a New York style decor with large outdoor patio.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Bastakiya Nights is a traditional local restaurant situated in the east of the city overlooking the Creek, and provides the perfect setting for traditional entertainment.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Award winning restaurant, BICE Mare, serves seafood inspired cuisine in the heart of Dubai Downtown Burj area with views of the iconic Burj Khalifa and the Fountain show from its highly sought after terrace.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From the airport towards Deira, past the airline centre (DNATA) traffic light, towards clock tower roundabout. Turn right at the clocktower, hotel is on the left-hand side.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Exit Right onto Al Dhaid Road, follow signs to Dubai/Abu Dhabi. Left on Emirates Road. Right on Airport Road. At Clock Tower, take a Right onto Abu Baker Al Siddique Road. On your left will be the Hamarain Shopping Centre which is adjacent to the hotel. Turn Left onto small side street right after you see Hamarain Shopping Centre.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Exit airport and follow signs towards Dubai via Sheikh Zayed Road. Take Maktoum Bridge exit. After going over Maktoum Bridge, follow signs to Abu Hail Corniche, which will lead you to a short underpass then onto Abu Baker Al Siddique Road. You will see Hamarain Shopping Centre on left hand side. Take left onto side street soon after passing Hamarain Shopping Centre. Hotel is connected to Hamarain Shopping Centre.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: 1. Head southwest 2. Turn right 3. Continue straight Go through 1 roundabout4. At the roundabout, take the 1st exit 5. At the roundabout, take the 1st exit 6. Slight right toward D 53 7. At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto D 53 8. Take the ramp to Sheikh Zayed Rd 9. Keep left at the fork and merge onto Sheikh Zayed Rd 10. Continue onto E 11 11. Keep right to continue toward D 78/Umm Hurair Rd12. Continue straight onto D 78/Umm Hurair Rd Continue to follow D 7813. Turn left onto Al Muraqqabat Rd 14. Turn right onto 37th St 15. Turn right onto 2 B St 16. Turn right onto Abu Baker Al Siddique Rd/D 78 Destination will be on the right

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour

Recreation.Name: Griffins Health Club & Luxury Spa in Dubai

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: Visit Griffins Health Club & Luxury Spa at the JW Marriott Hotel Dubai, and feel your cares melt away. Treat yourself to the best massage and aromatherapy treatments in Dubai, or jump into one of our plunge pools. Our hotel spa guarantees relaxation.

Recreation.Name: Saray Spa at Marriott Hotel Al Jaddaf, Dubai

Description.Name: Spa marketing description
Description.Text: In this bustling cosmopolitan city of Dubai, it is important to revitalize and rejuvenate the mind, body and soul. Saray Spa invites you to immerse in pure beauty with a touch of ancient healing techniques giving you a reviving, traditional experience.

Description.Name: Directions to Highway from Property
Description.Text: Turn left at Clock Tower Roundabout and head towards Garhoud bridge, taking the fly-over towards Emirates Road.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: Exit at the Garhoud exit and head towards Deira and take a right at the Clock Tower Roundabout. The hotel is on your left.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Enjoy the benefits of a fit lifestyle

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy at our fully equipped gym, complete with all the modern facilities that anyone at any level of fitness will require. We also offer therapeutic massage services by the pool.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Meetings and weddings for every size and taste

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Dubai Hotel is equipped with the latest in audio visual technology to make your events, meetings and weddings a sure success, we also have a wide rage of meeting and event spaces that can suit any requirement. Did we mention the amazing hydraulic stage.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Meetings and weddings for every size and taste

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Shuttle services now available to The Dubai Mall

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: We offer daily shuttle bus services to The Dubai Mall from the hotel at 11:00am and 5:30pm.Our daily pick up timing from The Dubai Mall is at 6:00pm.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Dubai Metro, Plan ahead, tickets and routes

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Plan your metro journey ahead with the Dubai RTA site giving you all the information you need to plan your trips on the Dubai Metro. Information on routes, zones and ticket prices.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Tee off is only a short ride away!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: With Dubai becoming a golfing hub, the choices are aplenty for every level of golfer. Ask our knowledgeable concierge to direct you to all the options for golf in Dubai, the closest being the Dubai Creek and Golf Club.

AvailableURL.Title: Tee off is only a short ride away!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Stay at any of the suites at the JW Marriott Hotel Dubai and earn triple Marriott Rewards points. Ask "At Your Service" agent to find out more.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: In a city where tradition meets innovation, a hotel of impeccable lineage finds its place. Luxury meets cool sophistication at the JW Marriott Dubai - authentic, crafted, intuitive. Fusing luxury with necessity, the hotel effuses understated opulence.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Embedded in the tradition of Arabian hospitality, the hotel's vantage point is its location in the heart of old Dubai. From airport to hotel, from meeting room to sauna, and on to brunch with friends, the Marriott experience anticipates every need.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Ultimately, you will judge us by the comfort and convenience of your stay. It is why we reward your trust with 351 guestrooms and suites of exceptional substance and style. For the discerning business traveler, enter a world of insight and perception.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: As our guest, we know you live meaningfully; turning your dreams into reality. At JW Marriott Dubai we allow you the chance to hone those passions, as we offer award-winning culinary and cultural experiences.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: When flavor and quality are of great significance, our chefs will delight with a remarkable variety of flavors and award-winning restaurants to satisfy the most fastidious of palates; focusing on the freshest ingredients to prepare authentic cuisine.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: shoulder season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: shoulder season for corporate and groups

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The exclusive JW Marriott Hotel Dubai is renowned for its impressive range of accommodations, restaurants and meeting space. Set in the vibrant business district just 10 minutes from Dubai International Airport, this luxury hotel in Dubai offers inspired touches on a grand scale. Spacious accommodations are furnished to meet the highest standards, while the 52 elegantly designed suites provide superior luxury and exclusive services. Dining transcends expectations with a tempting choice of 10 restaurants and bars. To unwind, the JW Marriott Hotel Dubai offers a refreshing rooftop pool and fully equipped health club. For a superior meeting and conference our award-winning event venue’s beautifully accommodates events of nearly every size with 34 meeting rooms, 31,215 sq ft of total meeting space.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: • One of the largest ballrooms in the area • Very flexible meeting space• Dedicated events by JW team • Need dates for groups are weekends and summer June- August • Ideal group size is 150 rooms per night or below • Very close to Dubai International airport- easy accessible • Looking for year round aircrew
